sentences.sentence: Grandpa got his horticulturalist certificate when he was 20.
sentences.translation: 爷爷20岁的时候就考到园艺师证书了。

sentences.sentence: And neither Kew nor Wisley have fountain displays choreographed by Colvin Randall, who initially trained as a horticulturalist at Longwood and is now their archivist.
sentences.translation: Kew和Wisley都没有的是Colvin Randall设计的喷泉展示，他起初在长木接受园艺培训，而现在却成了档案保管员。

sentences.sentence: Father-of-three Mr England, who works as a RHS horticulturalist and lives in Lockleaze, Bristol, was stunned because wild squirrels are usually highly secretive animals.
sentences.translation: 史蒂夫·英格兰先生有三个孩子，他是皇家园艺学会的园艺师，目前居住在布里斯托尔的Lockleaze。 当时他被眼前的情景惊呆了，因为通常情况下，野生松鼠的行踪高度诡秘。
